title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.7 - Damage to authority property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.7 - Damage to authority property

State Regulations
(a) No person shall cut, mutilate or remove
any trees, shrubs or plants located on the authority facilities. (b) No person shall deface, damage, mutilate
or remove any sign, delineator structure, fence, or any other property or
equipment of the authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
204.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
